overview: Ross is a founding partner of Kreos and has been heavily involved with the development of Kreosâ€™ newer markets. He focuses on technology financing in the UK and continental Europe. Ross has significant experience in operational/marketing roles in large organisations as well as building intrapreneurial and entrepreneurial ventures. Prior to Kreos, his most recent position was Vice President of Operations for American International Group’s (AIG) continental European operations focusing on developing marketing strategies for 14 countries, building small country operations and coordinating the acquisitions and management of alternative distribution channels. Ross holds an MBA from Carnegie Mellon University and a BA in Business from the University of Texas.
